GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of a single article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comment objects of a single article

exampleResponse.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

exampleResponse.body: The owls are not what they seem.
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of a single comment that has been added to the table

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of a single article including the updated 'votes' property

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: removes an individual comment object and only returns the applicable status code

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all user objects
